body: So I've been banned, for using FORCEFIELD, and NO I didn't use force field, here is the video with the so called ``PROOF'' the Mods gave me. and said I was, um, ban evading? Tell Me If this is hacking, Please...
body_tagged: So I've been banned, for using FORCEFIELD, and NO I didn't use force field, here is the video with the so called ``PROOF'' the Mods gave me. and said I was, um, ban evading? Tell Me If this is hacking, Please...
title: Tell me If this is hacking, please

replies.body: Also, I wasn't ban evading? I never used an alternate account to get onto the server?
replies.body_tagged: Also, I wasn't ban evading? I never used an alternate account to get onto the server?

replies.body:
Please do not carry out appeals outside of the appeals section. It's not necessary, and above all, it causes drama. If you want a second opinion, I can forward it to the staff team again, but you were already given a jurisdiction in your appeal.

Locking.
